result.execSummary:
All charges against Larry Darnell Williams in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Larry Darnell Williams is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Larry Darnell Williams

records.addlTxt: Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in court with attorney Tedia K. Gamino.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State's essential witness is NOT present in court, therefore, the State is unable to proceed today.  No alternative theory.  Motion to dismiss by the defense argued and GRANTED by the Court.  Case dismissed without prejudice.
Received and Filed. Defense Motion in Limine
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Defense Motion to Admit Other Acts
filed.
State's Motion In Limine, filed.

Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in court with attorney Tedia K. Gamino.  Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in custody.  Sara Nicole Volden Sadowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Larry Darnell Williams appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Final Pretrial held.  Parties advise Court they remain in trial posture.  Case remains calendared for SPEEDY Jury Trial on 7/5/2022 at 8:30 am, Courthouse Room 504.

Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in court with attorney Tedia K. Gamino.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Larry Darnell Williams appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and SPEEDY jury trial.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court, defendant Larry Darnell Williams not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court on defense motion to modify bail.  Arguments heard.  Court DENIED defense request to modify bail.  Case remains scheduled for a status conference on 5-26-22 at 8:30 am.
Defendant is to be produced for the next court date by zoom to address speedy trial demand.
Motion to modify bail, filed. Court schedules case for bail/bond hearing on 5/11/2022 at 8:30 am. Parties notified.

Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court, defendant Larry Darnell Williams not in court, in custody.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means for .  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests additional status conference hearing.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court, defendant Larry Darnell Williams not in court, in custody.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Parties are still negotiating and requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 4-26-22 at 8:30 am via zoom.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 10:
Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in court with Attorney Tedia K. Gamino; both appear by video.  Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer S. Solati.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

-received and filed. 
Attorney Tedia Gamino

Defendant entered a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.
EXPIRES JUNE 1, 2022
Defendant's Motion for a Speedy Trial.  (Larry D. Williams - #2022000506, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Larry Darnell Williams not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Larry Darnell Williams not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with EIC.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for Electronic Monitoring.   If electronic monitoring device is unavailable and cash bail has been paid, bail to revert to $30,000.00 .  If alternative bail is paid, Defendant to be released and placed on Electronic Monitoring waiting list. No contact order monitoring only.
   Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
 No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in court with attorney Thomas R. Reed.  Defendant Larry Darnell Williams in custody.  Mario Fiumefreddo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
